name: [LD51] Epheblob
description:
Hurry up ! They don't live longer .... 

Go to the exit of each level using every blobs unique capabilities ! But be careful to life time ;)

My entry for the Ludum Dare 51 "Every 10 seconds".

Keys:

- WASD / ZQSD keys to move

- SPACE to jump

- ESCAPE to pause

- BACKSPACE to restart level

- ENTER to kill blob

No time to polish but I hope you will enjoy it anyway. 😉
